sentences.en: A farmer in France farms intensively.
sentences.cn: 法国的农民使用精耕细作的方法.

sentences.en: All factors affecting SLS quality and their levels are intensively analyzed.
sentences.cn: 全面分析了影响SLS试验的各种因素及影响级别.

sentences.en: Computer can not only com file materials but also store them intensively.
sentences.cn: 计算机不仅能汇集资料,而且会像高度汇集资料那样储存资料.

sentences.en: Polyaniline ( PANI ) is one of the most intensively researched conductive polymer materials.
sentences.cn: 聚苯胺 ( PANI ) 是研究最为广泛的导电高分子材料之一.

sentences.en: Random lasing is intensively investigated for its wide prospective.
sentences.cn: 随机激光现象因其广阔的应用前景目前得到广泛的研究.

sentences.en: So intensively and so deep as our fingers unite, our hands caress.
sentences.cn: 如此强烈如此深沉就像我的手握在一起, 互相拥抱.

sentences.en: The land here has been intensively cultivated for generations.
sentences.cn: 这片土地经过了几代人的集约耕作.

sentences.en: The process of carbonation precipitation is intensively affected by super - saturation.
sentences.cn: 碳酸化分解过程强烈地受到过饱和度的影响.

sentences.en: The same procedure is followed more intensively at the doctoral level.
sentences.cn: 修博士学位程序也是如此,不过更为深入.

sentences.en: These distinctions matter because the courts will review some types of determinations more intensively than others.
sentences.cn: 这些区别很要紧,因为法院在审查时对有些种类的决定较之其他决定更为深入细致.

sentences.en: Thiophene polymers is one of the most intensively investigated functional polymers.
sentences.cn: 摘要噻吩类聚合物是研究较为广泛的功能高分子材料.

sentences.en: This treatment is special developed to intensively clean and purify the skin.
sentences.cn: 深层净化抗痘护理能密集有效的洁净及净化肌肤.

sentences.en: To feed a large population, inferior land must be cultivated and the good land worked intensively.
sentences.cn: 为了提供众多人口的口粮, 必须耕种贫瘠的田地,而且还得过度地使用良田.

sentences.en: What are you thinking of so intensively? Out with it!
sentences.cn: 你在苦思冥想些什么? 说出来吧!

sentences.en: Will they farm the rest of their land less intensively?
sentences.cn: 他们会在其余土地上实施较轻程度的集约化耕种吗？
